Kalon Rollins
=============

[Administration](https://www.chandlertx.com/Directory.aspx?DID=5)  
Title: City Administrator  
Phone: [(903) 849-6853 Ext. 101](tel:9038496853;101)
  
[Contact City Administrator](mailto:krollins@chandlertx.com)

  
  

Police Non-Emergency Ph: (903) 849-2181

Emergency: Call 9-1-1
